title: Equation
summary: In mathematics, an equation is a formula that expresses the equality of two expressions, by connecting them with the equals sign =.[2][3] The word equation and its cognates in other languages may have subtly different meanings; for example, in French an Ã©quation is defined as containing one or more variables, while in English, any well-formed formula consisting of two expressions related with an equals sign is an equation.[4]
